= Test Fixtures from 7-Zip

== Source

These test fixtures are from the 7-Zip project.

* Project: 7-Zip
* URL: https://www.7-zip.org/
* Source: https://github.com/mcmilk/7-Zip
* License: GNU LGPL + unRAR license restriction
* Author: Igor Pavlov

== Attribution

Copyright (C) 1999-2023 Igor Pavlov

These test files are used with permission under the GNU LGPL license
for compatibility testing with the 7-Zip archive format.

== License

7-Zip source code is licensed under the GNU LGPL license.

The 7-Zip license contains the following sections:

* 7-Zip Extra is licensed under the BSD 3-clause license
* unRAR source code is licensed under a mixed license with limitations
  on commercial distribution of modified versions

See the 7-Zip distribution for full license texts.

== Files Included

* `simple_lzma.7z` - Basic LZMA compression
* `simple_lzma2.7z` - LZMA2 compression
* `with_directory.7z` - Directory structure
* `multi_file.7z` - Multiple files
* `simple_copy.7z` - Store method (no compression)

== Usage in Omnizip

These fixtures verify Omnizip can correctly read and write 7z archives
compatible with the official 7-Zip implementation.

== Modifications

None. These are standard test archives created with 7-Zip.
